Material used.Description: HEK293 cells expressing wild-type and E64D mutant SLC13A5 were used.

Readout description.Result Description: E64D mutation significantly increased sodium-dependent dicarboxylate transport currents by 60% compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each cell was recorded in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SLC13A5-expressing cells were used as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected HEK293 cells were used as negative controls.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-tailed Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Transport current amplitude within 20% of wild-type control

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Transport current amplitude exceeding 30% of wild-type control

Material used.Description: CHO cells stably expressing wild-type and E64D mutant SLC13A5 were analyzed.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: No significant change in protein expression
Readout description.Result Description: E64D mutation did not alter SLC13A5 protein expression levels compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Four independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SLC13A5-expressing CHO cells were used as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Untransfected CHO cells were used as negative controls.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test was used.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression within 15% of wild-type control

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression deviating by more than 25% from wild-type control

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells expressing wild-type and E64D mutant SLC13A5 were subjected to viability testing.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: No significant change in cell viability
Readout description.Result Description: E64D mutation did not significantly affect cell viability compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was tested in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SLC13A5-expressing HEK293 cells were used as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Untransfected HEK293 cells were used as negative controls.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-way ANOVA with Bonferroni correction was used.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability within 10% of wild-type control

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability deviating by more than 20% from wild-type control
